it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp

Class DhcpStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.dhcp.DhcpStack

  • public class DhcpStack
extends java.lang.Object
    Default dhcp settings and static methods for loading, saving, and managing dhcp stuffs.

    Static attributes specify the configuration file, the default log output, ip_address and port numbers, timeouts, client and server specific configurations.

    Static methods includes method for loading DhcpStack parameters and for generating DHCP client XID.

        public java.lang.String broadcast_address
        Dhcp scope. Set 127.0.0.1 for local or 255.255.255.255 for limited broadcast

        Whether acting as dhcp server (yes/no)

        Whether sending mhcp advertisement (yes/no)

      • server_address

        public java.lang.String server_address
        Dhcp server address

      • source_socket_patch

        public boolean source_socket_patch
        Send packets through a different socket bound to a specific interface. This option can be useful to force broadcast packets to be sent through a specific interface, in OSs that do not forward broadcast packet to all interfaces. VERY IMPORTANT: Some DHCP clients do not recognize DHCP message received with a non-standard source port. (values: yes/no)

      • local_server_patch

        public boolean local_server_patch
        Send broadcast packet to 127.0.0.1 when no ip address is in use for the local host. This option can be used when the dhcp server run on a dhcp client host. (values: yes/no)

      • available_addresses

        public java.lang.String[] available_addresses
        Dhcp available addresses (as strings in the form of address/mask)
